title: 222: Bisexuality + Purity Culture + Hedonism Retreat w/ Gabrielle Alexa
itunes:title: 222: Bisexuality + Purity Culture + Hedonism Retreat w/ Gabrielle Alexa
description:
The Broads are joined by author and sex-positive influencer Gabrielle Alexa aka @gabalexa to chat about bisexuality, sexual shame from their religious upbringings, purity culture trauma, her experience at the hedonism retreat, non-mongamy, and much more!


GABRIELLE ALEXA:

Follow her at: https://www.instagram.com/gabalexa/

Website: https://gabriellealexa.com/

Preorder her book: https://gabriellealexa.com/how-to-live-with-the-internet-and-not-let-it-run-your-life/


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

orders!
